roadmap

specific ideas

  • Fix the items mentioned in issues.
  • Add claim-support to the Wikidata-data fetching (and support for claim-data in the field-definitions).
  • Finish the first prototype of the Conzept browser extension (which is already ~50% done) based on the Entity-Explosion extension, which can link web URLs to the Wikidata search formatter URL property, by executing a SPARQL query.
    • Extra extension idea: allow the extension to be used for text-selection intelligence (using Named Entity Recognization and Conzept linking).

general ideas

  • offline(-first) support with content-caching (especially useful when traveling)
  • research potential educational enhancements:
    • collaborative / social learning features (eg. the possibility to have audio-chat rooms around a topic)
    • user-created and auto-generated presentations around a topic
    • auto-generated topic quizzes
    • note taking
  • integrate / create a more lightwight MIDI-webcomponent (html-midi-player is more than 0.5MB by itself!)
